value:
$WmMPID_マリア,ch01_08_Maria_F_Normal,Face|$w0|I'm sick of being helpless. I won't be
a burden anymore. I'm staying here
and fighting! No protesting!$k$p

$WmMPID_ミシェイル,ch01_22_Misheil_M_Normal,Face|$w0|For me to perish now would mean
victory for my sister. So understand
me: I cannot die here.$k$p

$WmMPID_エリンシア,ch09_06_Erincia_F_Normal,Face|$w0|I may not fight as well as the others,
but...just doing nothing makes me so
uneasy I fear my heart will burst!$k$p

$WmMPID_ネサラ,ch11_06_Naesala_M_Normal,Face|$w0|You think if you bring Reyson and
Leanne into it, I'll do as I've been
told and fight, do you? ...Curse you!$k$p

$WmMPID_リュシオン,ch11_07_Rieusion_M_Normal,Face|$w0|We may not be able to let go of our
hatred of hum— of beorc, but... Let
Serenes Forest trouble you no more.$k$p
